Bash(venv/bin/python3 -c "
from app import app
from db_manager import get_student_progress, update_student_progress

# Create a new test student
progress = get_student_progress(''test_student'')
print(f''✅ Created new student: test_student'')
print(f''Current module: {progress[""current_module""]}'')

# Update progress
update_student_progress(''test_student'', {
    ''current_module'': 3,
    ''modules'': {
        1: {''quiz_passed'': True, ''quiz_score'': 90, ''project_passed'': True, ''attempts'': 1}
    }
})
print(''✅ Updated student progress'')

# Verify update
progress = get_student_progress(''test_student'')
print(f''Updated current module: {progress[""current_module""]}'')
print(f''Module 1 quiz passed: {progress[""modules""][1][""quiz_passed""]}'')
print(f''Module 1 quiz score: {progress[""modules""][1][""quiz_score""]}'')
")

Bash(venv/bin/python3 -c "
from app import app
from db_manager import get_student_progress, update_student_progress

# Get current progress
progress = get_student_progress(''rune'')
print(f''Current module: {progress[""current_module""]}'')

# Update to module 9
progress[''current_module''] = 9
update_student_progress(''rune'', progress)

# Verify
progress = get_student_progress(''rune'')
print(f''Updated to module: {progress[""current_module""]}'')
print(''✅ Student progress updated to Day 9'')
")
